title: Our children's Occupational Therapists (OT's) are celebrating OT Week by sharing how proud they are ...

attachments.displayName:
Our children's Occupational Therapists (OT's) are celebrating OT Week by sharing how proud they are to do their job #proud2bOT

Why do you love being an OT?

I am proud to work with such a dedicated team of paediatric occupational therapists at EKHUFT.

I'm really proud to help children be as independent as possible with everyday tasks, however small that step is within the task.

I'm really proud to be able to provide equipment that makes caring for the children more manageable for their parents/carers.

I'm proud to teach school staff about fine and gross motor skills to enable them to improve children’s skills in the classroom.

actor.displayName: East Kent Hospitals University NHS Foundation Trust
